# Tokenising

```{r}
sherlock_bigrams <- sherlock %>% unnest_tokens(bigram, text, token = "ngrams", n = 2)
sherlock_bigrams %>%+     separate(bigram, c("word1", "word2"), sep = " ") %>%+     filter(!word1 %in% stop_words$word) %>%+     filter(!word2 %in% stop_words$word)

sherlock_bigrams %>%+     separate(bigram, c("word1", "word2"), sep = " ") %>%+     filter(!word1 %in% stop_words$word) %>%+     filter(!word2 %in% stop_words$word) %>% unite(bigram, word1, word2, sep=" ") %>% count(bigram, sort=TRUE)
```
